name: Project Haywire
description:
A little something for a uni assignment. It's a combination of a turn based rpg and a rhythm game because honestly i think it might be a fun combo.

Just to remind you that this is a prototype meaning that it is rushed and bad especially since (like my last project) i left it to the last minute

Controls are simple:

Arrow Keys (in menu): select option

Enter: confirm selection

Escape: cancel selection

Arrow Keys (while attacking): hit note

When the game starts there's a menu that lets you enter some stats (and if you enter nothing it all breaks so please actually bother with it)

once again the font can be found here: https://managore.itch.io/m6x11 (i love this font)

source cod e soon tm
